name: B-17 Aces High
overview: Published in July of 1985 in Next Game #05 (07/1985), this Italian language, PETSCII flight simulator by Marco Mietta puts you in the cockpit of the famous B-17 bomber called the flying fortress. Where you can switch between the roles of the pilot and navigator keeping the bomber on course and the machine gunners trying to protect the craft during the journey to the target and hopefully back again.
